Text.val: -- Status: OK (At the moment program has no functionality, is called from
1. Move the four initial characters to the end of the string
2. Replace the letters in the string with digits
3. Convert the string to an integer (i.e. ignore leading zeroes)
4. Calculate mod-97 of the new number, which results in the remainder
5. Subtract the remainder from 98 and set PO.IBAN (pos. 3-4) = calculated 2-digit number
